instructions.heading: How to use this app
instructions.text:
Welcome!

In this app, you're going to learn the dance "Shirt-zha".

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

In this trial, a few practice speeds are available to you. We recommend learning the dance at a slow speed at first before practicing at higher speeds.

After that, you'll record a video of you performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

activities.title: Preview @ 1.0x
activities.startInstruction: Here's the dance you'll be learning...

activities.title: Preview @ 0.5x
activities.startInstruction: Here's the dance you'll be learning...

activities.title: Practice
activities.startInstruction: Get ready to follow along!
activities.endInstruction: Try again as many times as you'd like!

activities.title: Record & Review
activities.startInstruction: Get ready to follow along! We'll record you so you can see how you did at the end
activities.endInstruction: Try again as many times as you'd like!

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

upload.prompt: Show us what you've learned so far!
Show us what you've learned so far!

instructions.text:
Welcome!

In this app, you're going to learn the dance "Savage Love (Qijia)".

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

In this trial, a few practice speeds are available to you. We recommend learning the dance at a slow speed at first before practicing at higher speeds.

After that, you'll record a video of you performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: How to use this app
instructions.text:
Welcome!

In this app, you're going to learn the dance "Cold Dance".

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

In this trial, a few practice speeds are available to you. We recommend learning the dance at a slow speed at first before practicing at higher speeds.

After that, you'll record a video of you performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

In this trial, a few practice speeds are available to you. We recommend learning the dance at a slow speed at first before practicing at higher speeds.

After that, you'll record a video of you performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: How to use this app
instructions.text:
Welcome!

In this app, you're going to learn the dance "Cold Dance".

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

In this trial, a few practice speeds are available to you. We recommend learning the dance at a slow speed at first before practicing at higher speeds.

After that, you'll record a video of you performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

Welcome!

In this app, you're going to learn the dance "Hello B$$$".

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

After that, you'll record a video of you performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

activities.startInstruction: Get ready to follow along! We'll record you so you can see how you did at the end

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: How to use this app
instructions.text:
Welcome!

In this app, you're going to learn the dance "Sup-a-lonely".

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

In this trial, a few practice speeds are available to you. We recommend learning the dance at a slow speed at first before practicing at higher speeds.

After that, you'll record a video of you performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording two videos of you performing the dance. 
- For the first recording, the music will play at half speed. This will help us observe your memorization of the dance.
- For the second recording, the music will be played at full speed. This will help us observe your fluency with the dance.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

upload.prompt: Show us what you've learned so far!
